title: Art of Amanda Conner
description: Desperado and IDW are proud to present this inaugural collection of one of comics' brightest and most popular talents in the field today. Her art has been called charming, inviting, friendly, and accessible. A foundation of elegance, dynamic design, and personality can be found in every single panel of her work. Sought after by all the top writers in comics today -- including Grant Morrison, Garth Ennis, Mark Millar, Warren Ellis, and Jimmy Palmiotti -- Amanda Conner, with her amazing modern and tasteful take on the classic pin-up, has paved the way for countless female artists in a predominately male-oriented industry.
author: Amanda Conner
